txt.en: Defeat Keen-eye and collect his beak
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing Aiding the Eastemnet will cancel this quest</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Keen-eye has been spotted atop a frozen waterfall in the High Knolls, and it is believed that his beak will be a valuable part of a collection of bounties.
'Well done, [placeholder]! This trophy will be a lively addition to my ever-growing collection.'

'Hail, [placeholder]! I hear you are quite the foe-hunter in these parts. Perhaps we can work together, eh?

'I am a collector of odds and ends -- trophies of the enemy. I believe that someday they will be of great historical value, you see.

'A spying craban from Isengard named Keen-eye is thought to lead all of the spying birds in Wildermore. He has been seen nesting atop a frozen waterfall in the High Knolls. Will you bring me his beak? I'll see that you are amply rewarded.'
Keen-eye can be found in the High Knolls, atop the rocky tunnel and frozen waterfall that cover the southern road in the High Knolls.\n\nYou should summon and defeat Keen-eye, and collect his beak.
Britric is in Forlaw.\n\nYou have collected the beak of Keen-eye, and should now return to Forlaw to collect your bounty.
